00023       class RandomIterator,

00025       > class at_index_comp
00026       {
00027       public:
00028       
00029         at_index_comp(const RandomIterator &first, const Comparator &comp) :
00030           elements_(first), comp_(comp)
00031           {}
00032       
00033         bool operator() (unsigned i, unsigned j)
00034           {
00035             return comp_(*(elements_+i), *(elements_+j));

00074   template<class ElementIterator, class ElementComparator>
00075   reorder_iterator<ElementIterator>
00076   sort_iterator(ElementIterator first,
00077                 ElementIterator last,
00078                 ElementComparator comp,
00079                 unsigned permutationSize)
00080   {
00081     ptrdiff_t size = std::distance(first, last);
00082     if (size < 0)
00083       throw bad_parameter_value(
00084         "sort_iterator: "
00085         "bad input range.");
00086     if (permutationSize > unsigned(size))
00087       throw bad_parameter_value(
00088         "sort_iterator: "
00089         "parameter permutationSize out of range.");
00090         
00091     typedef
00092       typename reorder_iterator<ElementIterator>::index_container
00093       index_container;
00094     typedef
00095       typename reorder_iterator<ElementIterator>::index_container_ptr
00096       index_container_ptr;
00097     typedef
00098       typename reorder_iterator<ElementIterator>::index_t
00099       index_t;
00100   
00101     index_container_ptr index_collection(new index_container);
00102         
00103     index_collection->resize(size);
00104     for (index_t i = 0; i < index_t(size); ++i)
00105       (*index_collection)[i] = i;
00106     
00107     if (permutationSize == unsigned(size))
00108       std::sort(index_collection->begin(),
00109                 index_collection->end(),
00110                 detail::at_index_comp
00111                 <ElementIterator, ElementComparator>(first, comp));
00112     else
00113     {
00114       std::partial_sort(index_collection->begin(),
00115                         index_collection->begin()+permutationSize,
00116                         index_collection->end(),
00117                         detail::at_index_comp
00118                         <ElementIterator, ElementComparator>(first, comp));
00119       index_collection->resize(permutationSize);
00120     }
00121     
00122     return reorder_iterator<ElementIterator>(first, index_collection);
00123   }
